channel.title: CVE Feed for N-able -- Ecosystem Agent
channel.description: The latest CVEs for N-able -- Ecosystem Agent

item.title: CVE-2024-5445|2024-08-09T19:20:08.170Z -- n-able -- ecosystem%20agent
item.description: Ecosystem Agent version 4 < 4.5.1.2597 and Ecosystem Agent version 5 < 5.1.4.2473 did not properly validate SSL/TLS certificates, which could allow a malicious actor to perform a Man-in-the-Middle and intercept traffic between the agent and N-able servers from a privileged network position.

item.title: CVE-2024-5445|2024-08-08T22:04:11.534Z -- n-able -- ecosystem%20agent
item.description: Ecosystem Agent version 4 < 4.5.1.2597 and Ecosystem Agent version 5 < 5.1.4.2473 did not properly validate SSL/TLS certificates, which could allow a malicious actor to perform a Man-in-the-Middle and intercept traffic between the agent and N-able servers from a privileged network position.
